076@Category(SmallTests.class)
077public class TestProtobufUtil {
078  @ClassRule
079  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
080    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestProtobufUtil.class);
081  private static final String TAG_STR = "tag-1";
082  private static final byte TAG_TYPE = (byte) 10;
083  private static final HBaseProtos.ServerName SERVER_NAME =
084    HBaseProtos.ServerName.newBuilder().setHostName("a.b.com").build();
085  private static final HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier REGION =
086    HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.newBuilder().setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("test"))
087      .setType(HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME).build();
088
089  public TestProtobufUtil() {
090  }
091
092  @Test
093  public void testException() throws IOException {
094    NameBytesPair.Builder builder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
095    final String omg = "OMG!!!";
096    builder.setName("java.io.IOException");
097    builder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(omg)));
098    Throwable t = ProtobufUtil.toException(builder.build());
099    assertEquals(omg, t.getMessage());
100    builder.clear();
101    builder.setName("org.apache.hadoop.ipc.RemoteException");
102    builder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(omg)));
103    t = ProtobufUtil.toException(builder.build());
104    assertEquals(omg, t.getMessage());
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * Test basic Get conversions.
109   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Get} fails
110   */
111  @Test
112  public void testGet() throws IOException {
113    ClientProtos.Get.Builder getBuilder = ClientProtos.Get.newBuilder();
114    getBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
115    Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
116    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
117    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
118    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
119    getBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
120
121    columnBuilder.clear();
122    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f2"));
123    getBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
124    getBuilder.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(true);
125    ClientProtos.Get proto = getBuilder.build();
126    // default fields
127    assertEquals(1, proto.getMaxVersions());
128    assertEquals(true, proto.getCacheBlocks());
129
130    // set the default value for equal comparison
131    getBuilder = ClientProtos.Get.newBuilder(proto);
132    getBuilder.setMaxVersions(1);
133    getBuilder.setCacheBlocks(true);
134    getBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(TimeRange.allTime()));
135    Get get = ProtobufUtil.toGet(proto);
136    assertEquals(getBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toGet(get));
137  }
138
139  /**
140   * Test Delete Mutate conversions.
141   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Delete} or a
142   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
143   */
144  @Test
145  public void testDelete() throws IOException {
146    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
147    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
148    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.DELETE);
149    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(111111);
150    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
151    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
152    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
153    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
154    qualifierBuilder.setDeleteType(DeleteType.DELETE_ONE_VERSION);
155    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(111222);
156    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
157    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
158    qualifierBuilder.setDeleteType(DeleteType.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS);
159    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(111333);
160    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
161    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
162
163    MutationProto proto = mutateBuilder.build();
164    // default fields
165    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
166
167    // set the default value for equal comparison
168    mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
169    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
170
171    Delete delete = ProtobufUtil.toDelete(proto);
172
173    // delete always have empty value,
174    // add empty value to the original mutate
175    for (ColumnValue.Builder column : mutateBuilder.getColumnValueBuilderList()) {
176      for (QualifierValue.Builder qualifier : column.getQualifierValueBuilderList()) {
177        qualifier.setValue(ByteString.EMPTY);
178      }
179    }
180    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, delete));
181  }
182
183  /**
184   * Test Put Mutate conversions.
185   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link Put} or a
186   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
187   */
188  @Test
189  public void testPut() throws IOException {
190    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
191    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
192    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.PUT);
193    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(111111);
194    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
195    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
196    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
197    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
198    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v1"));
199    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
200    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
201    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v2"));
202    qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(222222);
203    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
204    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
205
206    MutationProto proto = mutateBuilder.build();
207    // default fields
208    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
209
210    // set the default value for equal comparison
211    mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
212    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
213
214    Put put = ProtobufUtil.toPut(proto);
215
216    // put value always use the default timestamp if no
217    // value level timestamp specified,
218    // add the timestamp to the original mutate
219    long timestamp = put.getTimestamp();
220    for (ColumnValue.Builder column : mutateBuilder.getColumnValueBuilderList()) {
221      for (QualifierValue.Builder qualifier : column.getQualifierValueBuilderList()) {
222        if (!qualifier.hasTimestamp()) {
223          qualifier.setTimestamp(timestamp);
224        }
225      }
226    }
227    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.PUT, put));
228  }
229
230  /**
231   * Test basic Scan conversions.
232   * @throws IOException if the conversion to a {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan} fails
233   */
234  @Test
235  public void testScan() throws IOException {
236    ClientProtos.Scan.Builder scanBuilder = ClientProtos.Scan.newBuilder();
237    scanBuilder.setStartRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row1"));
238    scanBuilder.setStopRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row2"));
239    Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
240    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
241    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
242    columnBuilder.addQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
243    scanBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
244
245    columnBuilder.clear();
246    columnBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f2"));
247    scanBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
248
249    ClientProtos.Scan proto = scanBuilder.build();
250
251    // Verify default values
252    assertEquals(1, proto.getMaxVersions());
253    assertEquals(true, proto.getCacheBlocks());
254
255    // Verify fields survive ClientProtos.Scan -> Scan -> ClientProtos.Scan
256    // conversion
257    scanBuilder = ClientProtos.Scan.newBuilder(proto);
258    scanBuilder.setMaxVersions(2);
259    scanBuilder.setCacheBlocks(false);
260    scanBuilder.setCaching(1024);
261    scanBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(TimeRange.allTime()));
262    scanBuilder.setIncludeStopRow(false);
263    ClientProtos.Scan expectedProto = scanBuilder.build();
264
265    ClientProtos.Scan actualProto = ProtobufUtil.toScan(ProtobufUtil.toScan(expectedProto));
266    assertEquals(expectedProto, actualProto);
267  }
268
269  @Test
270  public void testToCell() {
271    KeyValue kv1 =
272      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("aaa"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
273    KeyValue kv2 =
274      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("bbb"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
275    KeyValue kv3 =
276      new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("ccc"), Bytes.toBytes("f1"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), new byte[30]);
277    byte[] arr = new byte[kv1.getLength() + kv2.getLength() + kv3.getLength()];
278    System.arraycopy(kv1.getBuffer(), kv1.getOffset(), arr, 0, kv1.getLength());
279    System.arraycopy(kv2.getBuffer(), kv2.getOffset(), arr, kv1.getLength(), kv2.getLength());
280    System.arraycopy(kv3.getBuffer(), kv3.getOffset(), arr, kv1.getLength() + kv2.getLength(),
281      kv3.getLength());
282    ByteBuffer dbb = ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(arr.length);
283    dbb.put(arr);
284    ByteBufferKeyValue offheapKV = new ByteBufferKeyValue(dbb, kv1.getLength(), kv2.getLength());
285    CellProtos.Cell cell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(offheapKV, false);
286    Cell newOffheapKV = ProtobufUtil
287      .toCell(ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY), cell, false);
288    assertTrue(CellComparatorImpl.COMPARATOR.compare(offheapKV, newOffheapKV) == 0);
289  }
290
291  /**
292   * Test Increment Mutate conversions.
293   * @throws IOException if converting to an {@link Increment} or
294   *                     {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Mutation} fails
295   */
296  @Test
297  public void testIncrement() throws IOException {
298
299    MutationProto proto = getIncrementMutation(111111L);
300    // default fields
301    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
302
303    // set the default value for equal comparison
304    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
305    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
306
307    Increment increment = ProtobufUtil.toIncrement(proto, null);
308    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(increment.getTimestamp());
309    mutateBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(increment.getTimeRange()));
310    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.INCREMENT, increment));
311  }
312
313  private MutationProto getIncrementMutation(Long timestamp) {
314    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
315    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
316    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationProto.MutationType.INCREMENT);
317    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
318    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
319    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
320    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
321    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(11L)));
322
323    if (timestamp != null) {
324      qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
325    }
326
327    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
328    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
329    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(22L)));
330    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
331    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
332
333    return mutateBuilder.build();
334  }
335
336  /**
337   * Older clients may not send along a timestamp in the MutationProto. Check that we default
338   * correctly.
339   */
340  @Test
341  public void testIncrementNoTimestamp() throws IOException {
342    MutationProto mutation = getIncrementMutation(null);
343    Increment increment = ProtobufUtil.toIncrement(mutation, null);
344    assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, increment.getTimestamp());
345    increment.getFamilyCellMap().values().forEach(cells -> cells
346      .forEach(cell -> assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, cell.getTimestamp())));
347  }
348
349  /**
350   * Test Append Mutate conversions.
351   * @throws IOException if converting to an {@link Append} fails
352   */
353  @Test
354  public void testAppend() throws IOException {
355    MutationProto proto = getAppendMutation(111111L);
356    // default fields
357    assertEquals(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT, proto.getDurability());
358
359    // set the default value for equal comparison
360    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder(proto);
361    mutateBuilder.setDurability(MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT);
362
363    Append append = ProtobufUtil.toAppend(proto, null);
364
365    // append always use the latest timestamp,
366    // reset the timestamp to the original mutate
367    mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(append.getTimestamp());
368    mutateBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(append.getTimeRange()));
369    assertEquals(mutateBuilder.build(), ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.APPEND, append));
370  }
371
372  /**
373   * Older clients may not send along a timestamp in the MutationProto. Check that we default
374   * correctly.
375   */
376  @Test
377  public void testAppendNoTimestamp() throws IOException {
378    MutationProto mutation = getAppendMutation(null);
379    Append append = ProtobufUtil.toAppend(mutation, null);
380    assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, append.getTimestamp());
381    append.getFamilyCellMap().values().forEach(cells -> cells
382      .forEach(cell -> assertEquals(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP, cell.getTimestamp())));
383  }
384
385  private MutationProto getAppendMutation(Long timestamp) {
386    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
387    mutateBuilder.setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row"));
388    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.APPEND);
389    if (timestamp != null) {
390      mutateBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
391    }
392    ColumnValue.Builder valueBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
393    valueBuilder.setFamily(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("f1"));
394    QualifierValue.Builder qualifierBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
395    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c1"));
396    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v1"));
397    if (timestamp != null) {
398      qualifierBuilder.setTimestamp(timestamp);
399    }
400    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
401    qualifierBuilder.setQualifier(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("c2"));
402    qualifierBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("v2"));
403    valueBuilder.addQualifierValue(qualifierBuilder.build());
404    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(valueBuilder.build());
405
406    return mutateBuilder.build();
407  }
408
409  private static ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder createProcedureBuilder(long procId) {
410    ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder builder = ProcedureProtos.Procedure.newBuilder();
411    builder.setProcId(procId);
412    builder.setClassName("java.lang.Object");
413    builder.setSubmittedTime(0);
414    builder.setState(ProcedureProtos.ProcedureState.RUNNABLE);
415    builder.setLastUpdate(0);
416
417    return builder;
418  }
419
420  private static ProcedureProtos.Procedure createProcedure(long procId) {
421    return createProcedureBuilder(procId).build();
422  }
423
424  private static LockServiceProtos.LockedResource createLockedResource(
425    LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType resourceType, String resourceName,
426    LockServiceProtos.LockType lockType, ProcedureProtos.Procedure exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure,
427    int sharedLockCount) {
428    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource.Builder build = LockServiceProtos.LockedResource.newBuilder();
429    build.setResourceType(resourceType);
430    build.setResourceName(resourceName);
431    build.setLockType(lockType);
432    if (exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure != null) {
433      build.setExclusiveLockOwnerProcedure(exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure);
434    }
435    build.setSharedLockCount(sharedLockCount);
436
437    return build.build();
438  }
439
440  @Test
441  public void testProcedureInfo() {
442    ProcedureProtos.Procedure.Builder builder = createProcedureBuilder(1);
443    ByteString stateBytes = ByteString.copyFrom(new byte[] { 65 });
444    BytesValue state = BytesValue.newBuilder().setValue(stateBytes).build();
445    builder.addStateMessage(Any.pack(state));
446    ProcedureProtos.Procedure procedure = builder.build();
447
448    String procJson = ProtobufUtil.toProcedureJson(Lists.newArrayList(procedure));
449    assertEquals("[{" + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"1\","
450      + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\"," + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\","
451      + "\"stateMessage\":[{\"value\":\"QQ==\"}]" + "}]", procJson);
452  }
453
454  @Test
455  public void testServerLockInfo() {
456    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
457      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.SERVER, "server",
458        LockServiceProtos.LockType.SHARED, null, 2);
459
460    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
461    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"SERVER\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"server\","
462      + "\"lockType\":\"SHARED\"," + "\"sharedLockCount\":2" + "}]", lockJson);
463  }
464
465  @Test
466  public void testNamespaceLockInfo() {
467    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
468      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.NAMESPACE, "ns",
469        LockServiceProtos.LockType.EXCLUSIVE, createProcedure(2), 0);
470
471    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
472    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"NAMESPACE\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"ns\","
473      + "\"lockType\":\"EXCLUSIVE\"," + "\"exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure\":{"
474      + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"2\"," + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\","
475      + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\"" + "}," + "\"sharedLockCount\":0" + "}]",
476      lockJson);
477  }

482      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.TABLE, "table",
483        LockServiceProtos.LockType.SHARED, null, 2);

490  @Test
491  public void testRegionLockInfo() {
492    LockServiceProtos.LockedResource resource =
493      createLockedResource(LockServiceProtos.LockedResourceType.REGION, "region",
494        LockServiceProtos.LockType.EXCLUSIVE, createProcedure(3), 0);
495
496    String lockJson = ProtobufUtil.toLockJson(Lists.newArrayList(resource));
497    assertEquals("[{" + "\"resourceType\":\"REGION\"," + "\"resourceName\":\"region\","
498      + "\"lockType\":\"EXCLUSIVE\"," + "\"exclusiveLockOwnerProcedure\":{"
499      + "\"className\":\"java.lang.Object\"," + "\"procId\":\"3\"," + "\"submittedTime\":\"0\","
500      + "\"state\":\"RUNNABLE\"," + "\"lastUpdate\":\"0\"" + "}," + "\"sharedLockCount\":0" + "}]",
501      lockJson);
502  }
503
504  /**
505   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
506   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
507   * when it contains tags and encode/decode tags is set to true.
508   */
509  @Test
510  public void testCellConversionWithTags() {
511    ExtendedCell cell = getCellWithTags();
512    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, true);
513    assertNotNull(protoCell);
514
515    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, true);
516    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
517    assertEquals(1, decodedTags.size());
518    Tag decodedTag = decodedTags.get(0);
519    assertEquals(TAG_TYPE, decodedTag.getType());
520    assertEquals(TAG_STR, Tag.getValueAsString(decodedTag));
521  }
522
523  private ExtendedCell getCellWithTags() {
524    Tag tag = new ArrayBackedTag(TAG_TYPE, TAG_STR);
525    ExtendedCellBuilder cellBuilder = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.DEEP_COPY);
526    cellBuilder.setRow(Bytes.toBytes("row1"));
527    cellBuilder.setFamily(Bytes.toBytes("f1"));
528    cellBuilder.setQualifier(Bytes.toBytes("q1"));
529    cellBuilder.setValue(Bytes.toBytes("value1"));
530    cellBuilder.setType(Cell.Type.Delete);
531    cellBuilder.setTags(Collections.singletonList(tag));
532    return cellBuilder.build();
533  }
534
535  private ExtendedCell getCellFromProtoResult(CellProtos.Cell protoCell, boolean decodeTags) {
536    ExtendedCellBuilder decodedBuilder =
537      ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.DEEP_COPY);
538    return ProtobufUtil.toCell(decodedBuilder, protoCell, decodeTags);
539  }
540
541  /**
542   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
543   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
544   * when it contains tags and encode/decode tags is set to false.
545   */
546  @Test
547  public void testCellConversionWithoutTags() {
548    ExtendedCell cell = getCellWithTags();
549    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, false);
550    assertNotNull(protoCell);
551
552    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, false);
553    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
554    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
555  }
556
557  /**
558   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
559   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
560   * when it contains tags and encoding of tags is set to false and decoding of tags is set to true.
561   */
562  @Test
563  public void testTagEncodeFalseDecodeTrue() {
564    ExtendedCell cell = getCellWithTags();
565    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, false);
566    assertNotNull(protoCell);
567
568    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, true);
569    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
570    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
571  }
572
573  /**
574   * Test {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(Cell, boolean)} and
575   * {@link ProtobufUtil#toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder, CellProtos.Cell, boolean)} conversion methods
576   * when it contains tags and encoding of tags is set to true and decoding of tags is set to false.
577   */
578  @Test
579  public void testTagEncodeTrueDecodeFalse() {
580    ExtendedCell cell = getCellWithTags();
581    CellProtos.Cell protoCell = ProtobufUtil.toCell(cell, true);
582    assertNotNull(protoCell);
583
584    ExtendedCell decodedCell = getCellFromProtoResult(protoCell, false);
585    List<Tag> decodedTags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(decodedCell);
586    assertEquals(0, decodedTags.size());
587  }
588
589  /**
590   * Used to confirm that we only consider truncatedMessage as EOF
591   */
592  @Test
593  public void testIsEOF() throws Exception {
594    for (Method method : InvalidProtocolBufferException.class.getDeclaredMethods()) {
595      if (
596        method.getParameterCount() == 0
597          && method.getReturnType() == InvalidProtocolBufferException.class
598      ) {
599        method.setAccessible(true);
600        InvalidProtocolBufferException e = (InvalidProtocolBufferException) method.invoke(null);
601        assertEquals(method.getName().equals("truncatedMessage"), ProtobufUtil.isEOF(e));
602      }
603    }
604  }
605
606  @Test
607  public void testSlowLogParamsMutationProto() {
608    MutationProto mutationProto =
609      ClientProtos.MutationProto.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row123")).build();
610
611    SlowLogParams slowLogParams = ProtobufUtil.getSlowLogParams(mutationProto, false);
612
613    assertTrue(slowLogParams.getParams()
614      .contains(Bytes.toStringBinary(mutationProto.getRow().toByteArray())));
615  }
616
617  @Test
618  public void testSlowLogParamsMutateRequest() {
619    MutationProto mutationProto =
620      ClientProtos.MutationProto.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row123")).build();
621    ClientProtos.MutateRequest mutateRequest =
622      ClientProtos.MutateRequest.newBuilder().setMutation(mutationProto)
623        .setRegion(HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.newBuilder()
624          .setType(HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME)
625          .setValue(ByteString.EMPTY).build())
626        .build();
627
628    SlowLogParams slowLogParams = ProtobufUtil.getSlowLogParams(mutateRequest, false);
629
630    assertTrue(slowLogParams.getParams()
631      .contains(Bytes.toStringBinary(mutationProto.getRow().toByteArray())));
632  }

634  @Test
635  public void testGetShortTextFormatNull() {
636    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(null);
637    assertNotNull(actual);
638    assertEquals("null", actual);
639  }

641  @Test
642  public void testGetShortTextFormatScanRequest() {
643    ClientProtos.ScanRequest.Builder builder = ClientProtos.ScanRequest.newBuilder();
644    builder.setRegion(REGION);
645    ClientProtos.ScanRequest scanRequest = builder.build();
646
647    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(scanRequest);
648
649    assertNotNull(actual);
650    assertEquals("region { type: REGION_NAME value: \"test\" }", actual);
651  }
652
653  @Test
654  public void testGetShortTextFormatRegionServerReportRequest() {
655    RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerReportRequest.Builder builder =
656      RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerReportRequest.newBuilder();
657    builder.setServer(SERVER_NAME);
658    RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerReportRequest request = builder.build();
659
660    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(request);
661
662    assertNotNull(actual);
663    assertEquals("server host_name: \"a.b.com\" load { numberOfRequests: 0 }", actual);
664  }
665
666  @Test
667  public void testGetShortTextFormatRegionServerStartupRequest() {
668    RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerStartupRequest.Builder builder =
669      RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerStartupRequest.newBuilder();
670    builder.setPort(8080);
671    builder.setServerCurrentTime(111111L);
672    builder.setServerStartCode(15L);
673    builder.setUseThisHostnameInstead("some-host-name");
674    RegionServerStatusProtos.RegionServerStartupRequest regionServerStartupRequest =
675      builder.build();
676
677    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(regionServerStartupRequest);
678
679    assertNotNull(actual);
680    assertEquals("port: 8080 server_start_code: 15 server_current_time: 111111"
681      + " use_this_hostname_instead: \"some-host-name\"", actual);
682  }
683
684  @Test
685  public void testGetShortTextFormatMutationProto() {
686    MutationProto mutationProto =
687      ClientProtos.MutationProto.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFromUtf8("row123")).build();
688
689    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(mutationProto);
690
691    assertNotNull(actual);
692    assertEquals("row=row123, type=APPEND", actual);
693  }
694
695  @Test
696  public void testGetShortTextFormatGetRequest() throws IOException {
697    ClientProtos.GetRequest getRequest = ClientProtos.GetRequest.newBuilder().setRegion(REGION)
698      .setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(new Get(Bytes.toBytes("foo")))).build();
699
700    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(getRequest);
701
702    assertNotNull(actual);
703    assertEquals("region= test, row=foo", actual);
704  }
705
706  @Test
707  public void testGetShortTextFormatMultiRequest() throws IOException {
708    ClientProtos.Action action = ClientProtos.Action.newBuilder()
709      .setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(new Get(Bytes.toBytes("foo")))).build();
710    ClientProtos.RegionAction regionAction =
711      ClientProtos.RegionAction.newBuilder().addAction(action).setRegion(REGION).build();
712
713    ClientProtos.MultiRequest multiRequest =
714      ClientProtos.MultiRequest.newBuilder().addRegionAction(regionAction).build();
715
716    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(multiRequest);
717
718    assertNotNull(actual);
719    assertEquals("region= test, for 1 action(s) and 1st row key=foo", actual);
720  }
721
722  @Test
723  public void testGetShortTextFormatMutateRequest() throws IOException {
724    ClientProtos.MutateRequest mutateRequest = ClientProtos.MutateRequest.newBuilder()
725      .setMutation(
726        ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.INCREMENT, new Increment(Bytes.toBytes("foo"))))
727      .setRegion(REGION).build();
728
729    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(mutateRequest);
730
731    assertNotNull(actual);
732    assertEquals("region= test, row=foo", actual);
733  }
734
735  @Test
736  public void testGetShortTextFormatCoprocessorServiceRequest() {
737    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall call = ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall.newBuilder()
738      .setRow(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes("foo"))).setMethodName("awesomeMethod")
739      .setServiceName("awesomeService")
740      .setRequest(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes("foo-request"))).build();
741
742    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest.Builder builder =
743      ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest.newBuilder();
744    builder.setRegion(REGION);
745    builder.setCall(call);
746    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest coprocessorServiceRequest = builder.build();
747
748    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(coprocessorServiceRequest);
749
750    assertNotNull(actual);
751    assertEquals("coprocessorService= awesomeService:awesomeMethod", actual);
752  }
753
754  @Test
755  public void testGetShortTextFormatMoveRegionRequest() {
756    MasterProtos.MoveRegionRequest.Builder builder = MasterProtos.MoveRegionRequest.newBuilder();
757    builder.setRegion(REGION);
758    builder.setDestServerName(SERVER_NAME);
759    MasterProtos.MoveRegionRequest moveRegionRequest = builder.build();
760
761    String actual = ProtobufUtil.getShortTextFormat(moveRegionRequest);
762
763    assertNotNull(actual);
764    assertEquals(
765      "region { type: REGION_NAME value: \"test\" } dest_server_name { host_name: \"a.b.com\" }",
766      actual);
767  }
